name: Shape.Me
description:
Welcome to a world where all human dreams are close to disappearing.
ShapeMe is a wonderful geometric puzzle game, guided by an adventure.
Help Nino solve puzzles, and find the other Amers along the way.

Merging shapes?
Seems easy enough...
Is it though?

Download Now!
